name: phaser3-parcel-template
description: A typescript template project for Phaser 3 using Parceljs

scripts.build:pages: rimraf docs && parcel build src/index.html --no-minify --out-dir docs --public-url /2019/
scripts.build:android: rimraf www && parcel build src/index.html --no-minify --out-dir www --public-url /android_asset/www/ && cordova build android

author: supertommy
